projects.title: Boba Now!
projects.description: Boba Now! is a mobile application that lets you quickly and easily find nearby bubble tea locations.
projects.details: This hybrid mobile application was developed using the Ionic framework with HTML, CSS, and TypeScript. The Yelp Fusion and Google Maps APIs were used to retrieve and display bubble tea locations.

projects.title: Blockle Sprint
projects.description: Blockle Sprint is a simple Tetris clone where you race against time to clear 40 lines as fast as possible.

projects.title: Prismatic Showdown
projects.description: Prismatic Showdown is a split-screen multiplayer game in which 2-4 players compete to transform a blank playing field into a mess of colors.

projects.title: Boop
projects.description: Boop is a simple mobile game where you draw various gestures to poke animals on the nose.
